title: Mau – AI Email Automation
description: Natural language powered API for sending contextual emails. Auto-fetches contacts and dispatches securely.

title: AR App – Backend Service
description: Developed Node.js + MySQL backend to deliver real-time product data for an iOS AR app.

title: Salesforce CRM – Manufacturing Industry
description: Implemented Salesforce Sales & Service Cloud with WhatsApp integration using Wati API.

title: VerseGo – Story Posting Web App
description: MERN-based platform for photo posts, likes, and edits. Real-time updates and intuitive UI.

title: RAG – PDF QA System
description: Node.js API that chunks and stores PDFs in MongoDB; integrates Gemini API for intelligent Q&A.

title: Biometric Processor
description: CSV processor that extracts student attendance and auto-fills data using SIN; backend exposes detailed APIs.
